Detailed Description

A processor that handles map loading and other map related functions.

This processor is currently not thread safe, due to MapSafeVector with the beginWork, endWork, and finishRequest.

virtual StringTable::stringCode MapHandlingProcessor::loadMap (  uint32  mapID,
uint32 &  mapSize
)  [pure virtual]
 

Virtual function for loading a map.

Should be called by handleRequest when that function gets a loadMapRequest and isn't virtual anymore.

Parameters:
mapID The map to load.
mapSize Outparameter describing the size of the map.
Returns:
StringTable::OK if ok or StringTable::ERROR_MAP_LOADED if map is loaded. Is really ok.

Implemented in InfoProcessor, MapProcessor, RouteProcessor, and SearchProcessor.

Removes a map from the loadedMaps-vector.

bool MapHandlingProcessor::startLoadingMap (  uint32  mapID  )  [protected]
 

Marks a map as being loaded in the safe vector.

Parameters:
mapID The Id of the map.
Returns:
True if no map was loading.

Member Data Documentation

MapSafeVector* MapHandlingProcessor::m_loadedMaps [private]
 

Pointer to the SafeVector in the Reader that contains mapID of all loadedMaps It should be updated after every processing of LoadMapRequestPackets.

Reimplemented from Processor.
